Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.CLI

Class NetworkHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.utilities.Observable<MessageEvent>
it.polimi.ingsw.client.CLI.NetworkHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer<MessageEvent>, java.lang.Runnable
public class NetworkHandler
extends Observable<MessageEvent>
implements java.lang.Runnable, Observer<MessageEvent>
Author:
Vasio1298 Network Handler is the class that handles the connection with server.

  • Constructor Details

    • NetworkHandler

      public NetworkHandler​(java.lang.String ip) throws java.io.IOException
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Starting method for the Network Handler thread.

      The method launches a thread dedicate to the heartbeat messages and a thread dedicate to analyze the messages received by the server.

      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable

    • stop

      public void stop() throws java.io.IOException
      Method that closes the Client Connection.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs when it closes this socket

    • update

      public void update​(MessageEvent message)
      Method called after a notification from the Client Controller.

      The method creates a string from the message received and creates a thread that handles the writing of the message to the client.

      Specified by:
      update in interface Observer<MessageEvent>
      Parameters:
      message - the message passed by the Controller

    • heartbeatRunnable

      public void heartbeatRunnable()
      Method that handle the sending of heartbeat messages to the server.

      After every half of the timeout it sends a message of type Message Event useful to let the server knows that this is still connected. When the socket is not active anymore, the method sends a last message to the server to let it know that this is not connected anymore and then shuts down the thread dedicate to this function.
